name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience in designing and developing robust applications, proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **REST API** implementation. Demonstrated ability in orchestrating microservices and leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration. Experienced in optimizing database solutions using **PostgreSQL** and incorporating asynchronous messaging with **Apache Pulsar**. 
In addition to strong back-end development, I possess a solid foundation in frontend technologies, having worked extensively with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. I have a proven track record of building high-performance, AI/ML-powered platforms that incorporate predictive analytics and automation. Skilled in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, while ensuring compliance with industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept in CI/CD practices to streamline the development process.
